entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 02:31 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
